sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Information.css"; export default function Infomation() { return ( <>

GRAPHIC DESIGNER

● JOB DESCRIPTION

{" "} • Design images for online marketing (website, fanpage, youtube, video ...), publications, products for communication activities of the business (banner, standee, banner, .... )

• Supervision of printing quality (proposing to choose printing and construction service providers; supervision of printing and construction to ensure the design publications meet the requirements for quality and aesthetics) publications serving the Company's business activities

• Can endure pressure when working at high intensity, on deadline.

• Ability to work independently and in groups.

• Other tasks as assigned by superiors

● JOB REQUIREMENT

· Proficient in Adobe IIIustrator, Photoshop and Figma

· Motion Graphic is a plus

· Proficient in: Adobe Illustrator (Ai), Adobe Photoshop (Ps), Adobe Indesign (Print), Intermediate Corel or higher

· Creative thinking skills

· Able to work under pressure and good attitude

· Experience from 1 year or more

); }
